Description:
The Print Releaf API enables automatic reforesting for a company's paper consumption. The system allows exchanging paper consumption for trees in realtime. Users can send raw paper consumption data to be analyzed, and certifiably reforest the equivalent number of trees at the reforestation project.
Developers can use API Keys to authenticate, make calls, and receive JSON formats in return. Developers can integrate PrintReleaf data about estimating, quoting, point-of-sale, or print monitoring with this API.
